title:
Be Inspired By: Paws, Claws and Teeth

Getting up close and personal, this theme is aimed to show everyone...

attachments.displayName:
Be Inspired By: Paws, Claws and Teeth

Getting up close and personal, this theme is aimed to show everyone the true aspects of these animals that demand respect, create admiration and awe and inspire fear in those unlucky enough to get in their path.

Wild Eye's +Andrew Beck  says: Death is not an easy event to portray in tasteful manner when it comes to wildlife photography. Sometimes is the sheer raw content that needs to be captured and other times a more subtle representation of death can do the job.

I was going for the more subtle approach when I photographed this young lion practicing its choke-hold on a buffalo calf in Botswana's Okavango Delta.

Keep a look out for what our Team has to share!

#wildlifephotos   #photography   #beinspiredbywildeye   #wildlifephotography   #paws
